title: Connect mobile via QR code
content: Connect via your wallet extension (e.g., Rabby, MetaMask) on desktopOn your phone, click the "Connect" button and select the option "Link Desktop Wallet." You will be prompted to activate your camera and scan a QR code On your desktop, click the PC+mobile icon in the top right of the navigation bar and sign the pop-up in your wallet extension. A QR code will appearUse your phone camera to scan the QR code Now you can trade on the go with your phone.PreviousHow to stake HYPENextExport your email walletLast updated 10 months ago
